Top Skills
Strategic Planning
Logo Design
Web Design
Languages
English (Professional Working)
Felix Duong
Product Owner /Senior Product Designer at TIKI Corporation
Vietnam
Summary
Skills, experience and qualification:
+ Good knowledge about User Experience, especially E-commerce:
+ Hands on experience with methods such as Scrum Agile,
Continuous Integration etc.
+ Experience communicating with technical and non-technical
stakeholders across multiple business units.
+ Experience in UI/UX:
* Proficient use of tools: Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator, HTML/CSS,
Marvel app, InVision, Origami Studio, Overflow, Whimsical, Zeplin...
+ Making Decision base on Data-Driven:
* Proficient use of tools: Google Analytics (4 certificates), Big query/
My SQL (1 certificate),  Facebook analytics, Firebase, Crazy Egg,
Google Data Studio, analytics & tracking tools, ...
+ Fluent in English
+ Good presentation and communication skill
+ Good in timing management
+ Have marketing knowledge
+ Fast learner, able to understand new system, new process quickly
+ Pro-active attitude, able to handle pressure
+ Confident in communication, make it easy for me to work in the
team
Experience
TIKI Corporation
Product Owner /Senior Product Designer
September 2018 - Present 
Vietnam
The description of my job role:
Role Product Designer:
- Embrace the Business requirement and support for clarification. balancing
between users, technical and business.
Page 1 of 4
- Research (Define the issue, collect current data, competitors, usability
testing...)
- Wireframe, sync up with stakeholder, mockup, continue to usability testing.
- Define Product Vision/OKR for the Big Project. (what next in MVP, phase 1,
phase 2...)
- Define rule/logic/event tracking for the project.
- Documents for Business + Docs for Dev team: Write up the functional
specification, rude including mock-up/flows etc.
- Define metrics for A/B testing.
Role Product Owner/ Product Manager:
- Maintain requirement trace-ability, linkage between user story - Functional
Spec - Business requirement.
- Prioritize product backlog items.
- Working close up with Dev Team to conduct backlog refinement to review
requirement with team before putting into sprint planning.
Define requirements that put into the sprint base on team member’s velocity
and ETA.
- Review and prioritize ad-hoc requirements that should be added into the
sprint or replaced by other requirements.
- Manage and make decision on release. Define timeline/roadmap detail for
release.
My Skills:
- Hands on experience with methods such as Scrum Agile, Continuous
Integration etc.
- Experience communicating with technical and non-technical stakeholders
across multiple business units.
- Experience in UI/UX:
* Proficient use of tools: Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator, Marvel app, InVision,
Origami Studio...
- Making Decision base on Data-Driven:
* Proficient use of tools: Google Analytics (4 certificates), Big query/My SQL (1
certificate),  Facebook analytics, Firebase, Crazy Egg, Google Studio,...
- Ability to work well under pressure.
Thanks.
Tinhte.vn
Product & UI/UX Lead
Page 2 of 4
April 2017 - Present 
209 Nam Kỳ khởi Nghĩa, Quận 3, TP. Hồ Chí Minh
- Design the new homepage tinhte.vn ver 6.0, forum, app, social community on
tinhte.vn
- Utilize APIs from data provided to implement better funtions for users
- Campaign designs: Tet tinh te, Tinhte rewards, tinhte’s choice 2017-2018
- Tracking user behaviour to propose positive changes
CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN ĐẦU TƯ THẾ GIỚI DI ĐỘNG
Product Manager
September 2016 - September 2018 (2 years 1 month)
- Act as an Product Manager of Fashion category (vuivui.com/thoi-trang)
- Receive requirement from relevant departments (category, content, call
center) and feedback on website to propose better changes in terms of UI/UX
- Responsible for the execution of whole cycle and any issues on web
- Build wireframe,storyboards, user flows, process flow and sitemaps the ideas
for members’ execution.
- Follow and consult category regarding sales flow on web. 
- Develop functions on web for better shopping experience
CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN ĐẦU TƯ THẾ GIỚI DI ĐỘNG
UI/UX Designer
September 2016 - August 2017 (1 year)
- Use Agile Scrum Project Management Methodology
- Receive brief from PM and design layout and functions on the platform
thegioididong.com and dienmayxanh.com
- Follow Dev sprint framework, follow product,  support technical team to adjust
layout if needed, UI testing after IT code
- Flexibility in designing, receive feedback from users to adjust the design for
better tracking and focus group 
Cdiscount Việt Nam
Web Graphic Designer
December 2015 - September 2016 (10 months)
163 Phan Dang Luu, Phu Nhuan Dist., HCMC
Design banners : Homepages , header , left menu , showcases ,
brochure , ..for cdiscount.vn
Design GIF files , banners on facebook 
EDM advertising design via mail
Design mascot for the company ( mascot for summer, mascot for Euro..)
